mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.business_system_id AS "businessSystem.id", a.rel_id AS "relId", a.channel_secret_key AS "channelSecretKey", a.push_rtmp_url AS "pushRtmpUrl", a.transcoding_paras AS "transcodingParas", a.logo AS "logo", a.rtmp_url AS "rtmpUrl", a.hls_url AS "hlsUrl", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.live_platform as "livePlatform", a.stream_id as "streamId"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM live_live_channel a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.rel_id LIKE '%'||#{relId}||'%' '%'+#{relId}+'%' concat('%',#{relId},'%')
AND a.channel_secret_key LIKE '%'||#{channelSecretKey}||'%' '%'+#{channelSecretKey}+'%' concat('%',#{channelSecretKey},'%')
AND a.push_rtmp_url LIKE '%'||#{pushRtmpUrl}||'%' '%'+#{pushRtmpUrl}+'%' concat('%',#{pushRtmpUrl},'%')
AND a.rtmp_url LIKE '%'||#{rtmpUrl}||'%' '%'+#{rtmpUrl}+'%' concat('%',#{rtmpUrl},'%')
AND a.hls_url LIKE '%'||#{hlsUrl}||'%' '%'+#{hlsUrl}+'%' concat('%',#{hlsUrl},'%')
AND a.stream_id = #{streamId}
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO live_live_channel( id, name, business_system_id, rel_id, channel_secret_key, push_rtmp_url, transcoding_paras, logo, rtmp_url, hls_url, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, live_platform, stream_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{businessSystem.id}, #{relId}, #{channelSecretKey}, #{pushRtmpUrl}, #{transcodingParas}, #{logo}, #{rtmpUrl}, #{hlsUrl}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{livePlatform}, #{streamId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE live_live_channel SET name = #{name}, business_system_id=#{businessSystem.id}, rel_id = #{relId}, channel_secret_key = #{channelSecretKey}, push_rtmp_url = #{pushRtmpUrl}, transcoding_paras = #{transcodingParas}, logo = #{logo}, rtmp_url = #{rtmpUrl}, hls_url = #{hlsUrl}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, live_platform = #{livePlatform}, stream_id = #{streamId} WHERE id = #{id}
